answers.text:
It is occurring in most communities.  We are beginning a series of Banking & Business Roundtables to try and relax the situation with banks to help businesses obtain loans.

author: Evelina Moulder
text: On the Lehrer News Hours last night, there was a segment about the difficulty that businesses are having in obtaining loans--even when their revenue has increased. One example described a company that had a significant increase in orders, but without a loan, it couldn't purchase the supplies to fill the orders. Is this occurring in your community? Do you have suggestions for dealing with this problem?
title: Loans for Small Businesses
